item.title: 中国经济进一步放缓凸显加大刺激力度的紧迫性
item.description: 中国第三季度经济扩张放缓，凸显出需要额外的刺激措施来帮助这个世界第二大经济体实现其年度增长目标。【原文：China’s economic expansion slowed in the third quarter, underscoring the need for additional stimulus to help the world’s second-largest economy reach its annual growth target.】

item.title: 流动性押注收紧，台湾掉期接近历史高点
item.description: 台湾的利率掉期接近历史新高，因为人们预期台湾货币当局可能会再次提高银行准备金率，从而收紧银行系统的现金水平。【原文：Taiwan’s interest-rate swaps are nearing record highs on expectations the island’s monetary authority may tighten cash levels in the banking system by once again raising the reserve ratio for banks.】

item.title: 降息遥遥无期，印度银行利润率因存款难寻而受损
item.description: 印度银行不断上升的信贷成本以及它们为吸引客户存款以缓解这一问题所做的努力，将继续成为 HDFC Bank Ltd. 和 Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. 周六发布财报时讨论的主要话题。【原文：Indian banks’ rising credit costs and their struggle to attract customer deposits to mitigate this will continue to dominate discussions when HDFC Bank Ltd. and Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. report earnings on Saturday.】

item.title: 日元跌至 150，日本警惕进一步走软
item.description: 日本最高货币官员警告说，在日元兑美元汇率跌破150后，他正在观察市场，一些策略师预测日元将进一步下跌。【原文：Japan’s top currency official warned he’s watching the market after the yen weakened beyond 150 per dollar, with some strategists predicting further declines.】

item.title: 中国房价持续低迷，虽有复苏努力
item.description: 尽管中国努力稳定房地产行业，但 9 月份的房价降幅几乎与上月持平。【原文：China’s September home prices fell at almost the same pace as the previous month, despite the country’s efforts to stabilize the real estate sector.】

item.title: 日元触及 150 点区间后，日本外汇主管警告不要采取突然行动
item.description: 日本最高货币官员周五警告说，在日元兑美元一夜之间跌至150区间后，他将密切关注市场走势。【原文：Japan’s top currency official warned Friday that he was keeping a close eye on market movements following the yen’s weakening into the 150 range against the dollar overnight.】

item.title: 中国大型银行下调存款利率，因刺激措施影响利润
item.description: 中国最大的国有贷款机构周五下调了存款利率，这是它们今年第二次下调利率，因为它们急于在盈利能力减弱的情况下挽救创纪录的低利润率。【原文：China’s largest state-owned lenders have cut their deposit rates on Friday, their second reduction this year as they rushed to salvage record low margins amid weakened profitability.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Regal 在卖空调查中被韩国起诉
item.description: 韩国监管机构起诉澳大利亚对冲基金 Regal Funds Management Pty Ltd 和一名前雇员涉嫌违反卖空规则。【原文：South Korea regulators have indicted Australian hedge fund Regal Funds Management Pty Ltd and a former employee for alleged breaches of short-selling rules.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势引发避险需求，黄金徘徊在历史记录附近
item.description: 尽管美国经济数据喜忧参半，令美联储今年大幅降息的希望破灭，但中东冲突不断升级，投资者纷纷寻求安全，黄金交易量接近周四创下的历史新高。【原文：Gold traded near Thursday’s record high as escalating Middle East conflicts saw investors flock to safety, even as mixed data on the US economy dashed hopes for large rate cuts by the Federal Reserve this year.】

item.title: 日本央行会议前日本通胀率自四月以来首次放缓
item.description: 在央行本月晚些时候召开会议之前，日本的主要通胀指标在 9 月份出现了 5 个月来的首次放缓，人们普遍预计央行将维持利率不变。【原文：Japan’s key inflation gauge slowed in September for the first time in five months, ahead of a central bank meeting later this month where the board is widely expected to keep the interest rate unchanged.】

item.title: 哈马斯领导人逝世后，石油市场趋于稳定，中东成为关注焦点
item.description: 哈马斯领导人叶海亚-辛瓦尔（Yahya Sinwar）逝世后，中东局势的发展备受关注，石油价格在五个交易日中首次上涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied, after notching its first gain in five sessions, with eyes on developments in the Middle East after the death of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar.】

item.title: 纽约市广播公司旗下的 Flagstar 公司裁员 700 人，更多员工将因单位出售而离职
item.description: 纽约社区银行集团（New York Community Bancorp）旗下的旗星银行（Flagstar Bank）将裁员 700 人，占员工总数的 8%，这也是该银行扭亏为盈努力的一部分。【原文：New York Community Bancorp’s Flagstar Bank is eliminating 700 jobs, or 8% of the workforce, as part of the lender’s effort to turn around its business.】

item.title: 美国高等级信贷息差降至二十年来最低点
item.description: 衡量美国蓝筹公司债券风险程度的一个关键指标已降至二十年来的最低水平，因为投资者正在争夺仍能提供相对较高收益率而又没有太大违约风险的债券。【原文：A key measure of perceived riskiness in US blue-chip company bonds has fallen to its lowest levels in two decades, as investors vie for debt that can still offer relatively high yields without too much default risk.】

item.title: 高盛与 Blackstone 合作出售新颖的基金融资债券
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. 已与黑石集团（Blackstone Inc. 合作，将私人基金贷款打包成债券，这是一种新颖的债务形式，银行未来可能会出售更多债券。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has teamed up with Blackstone Inc. to package private fund loans into bonds, a novel form of debt that banks could look to sell more of in the future.】

item.title: 化学品火灾后，中心桥支持的实验室面临压力
item.description: 佐治亚州罗克代尔县（Rockdale County）的一个化学仓库发生火灾，释放出大量有毒烟雾，数周后，在官员解除就地避难令后，附近居民现在可以在夜间离开家了。对于实验室的所有者和投资者来说，麻烦还没有结束。【原文：Weeks after a chemical warehouse fire in Rockdale County, Georgia, released plumes of toxic smoke, nearby residents can now leave their homes at night after officials lifted a shelter in place order. For the lab’s owner and investors, the trouble isn’t over.】

item.title: 交易商对美联储降息进行重新定价，债券出现抛售：市场综述
item.description: 由于新的经济活力迹象导致交易商降低了对美国降息的预期，国债大跌使美元走强，股市涨跌不一。【原文：A selloff in Treasuries strengthened the dollar and left equities mixed as new signs of economic vigor led traders to trim expectations for US rate cuts.】

item.title: 巴菲特在回购后抛售更多美国银行股票，持股比例回升至 10%以上
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）在美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Warren Buffett sold another slug of Bank of America Corp. stock after the lender repurchased enough of its own shares to nudge his stake back above 10% — a regulatory threshold that requires rapid disclosure.】

item.title: 提升信贷市场是印度实现 5 万亿美元目标的关键
item.description: 印度已经是世界上增长最快的主要经济体，它正在努力实现更大幅度的扩张，以成为一个发达国家，而这一目标取决于扩大获得资本的渠道。【原文：India, already the world’s fastest-growing major economy, is pushing for even more dramatic expansion to become a developed nation, a goal that hinges on expanding access to capital.】

item.title: 数字桥公司的 Ganzi 说，人工智能的最佳选择是 "镐和铲
item.description: 资产管理公司数字桥集团（DigitalBridge Group Inc.【原文：The best way to profit off the spread of artificial intelligence is to invest in data centers, the infrastructure that houses the booming technology, says Marc Ganzi, chief executive officer of asset manager DigitalBridge Group Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普-SPAC 内幕交易将二弟送入监狱
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司上市交易中牟利数百万美元的计划，最终以一对佛罗里达兄弟的惨败告终，两人均因内幕交易罪被判入狱。【原文：A scheme to make millions of dollars on a deal to take Donald Trump’s social media startup public ended badly for a pair of Florida brothers, with both sentenced to prison for insider trading.】

item.title: 新西兰升级与加拿大的乳制品出口争端
item.description: 新西兰与加拿大在乳制品出口商进入加拿大市场问题上的长期贸易争端正在升级。【原文：New Zealand is escalating a long-running trade dispute with Canada over access for its dairy exporters to the Canadian market.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克在得克萨斯州注册两个 "美国 "主题实体
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）似乎在得克萨斯州成立了两家新的神秘公司，其名称表明这两家公司与他越来越多地参与美国政治有关。【原文：Elon Musk appears to have established two new mysterious companies in Texas whose names suggest ties to his increasing involvement in US politics.】

item.title: 洛克菲勒中心债券创下 2021 年以来最大一笔 CMBS 销售记录
item.description: 由纽约市房地产皇冠上的明珠之一洛克菲勒中心（Rockefeller Center）担保的 34 亿美元巨额债券销售于本周四结束，标志性景点成为 2024 年出售的大量商业抵押支持证券中的一员。【原文：A behemoth $3.4 billion bond sale backed by Rockefeller Center, one of New York City’s real estate crown jewels, wrapped up on Thursday, adding the iconic attraction to a deluge of commercial mortgage-backed securities sold in 2024.】

item.title: Netflix 的各项主要指标均超出华尔街预测
item.description: Netflix 公司第三季度新增用户超过 500 万，尽管新节目单受到去年好莱坞罢工事件的限制，但各项主要财务指标均超出华尔街预期。【原文：Netflix Inc. added more than 5 million customers in the third quarter, and eclipsed Wall Street’s expectations on every major financial metric despite a new programming slate constrained by last year’s strikes in Hollywood.】

item.title: 根据英国央行建议，英国银行家将提前数年获得奖金
item.description: 英国监管机构计划放宽危机后的奖金规定，使银行家们可以立即获得部分现金，而不必再被迫等待五年以上才能获得全额报酬。【原文：UK regulators plan to ease post-crisis bonus rules so bankers can get some of their cash immediately and are no longer forced to wait more than five years for full payouts.】

item.title: 为什么共产党人也需要市场竞争
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼的世界币有了新名字和新硬件
item.description:
这家初创公司将放弃品牌名称中的 "硬币"，专注于在人工智能时代识别人类。【原文：

The startup is dropping ‘coin’ from its brand name, and will focus on identifying humans in an AI age. 

】

item.title: Pimco 称私人信贷估值过高，自满情绪蔓延
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Current private debt returns fail to justify the growing risk, according to Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 解释 "播客选举 "的七个数据点
item.description:
加：Spotify 希望在好莱坞新建工作室

。【原文：

Plus: Spotify looks to build new studios in Hollywood

】

item.title: Kaiko 称，DeFi 发行人的清洗交易仍 "普遍存在
item.description: 上周，联邦检察官在一次精心策划的刺探行动后对加密货币推广者和交易者进行了围捕，这提醒人们，用于抬高价格的虚假交易仍然是数字资产领域挥之不去的问题。【原文：Last week’s roundup of crypto promoters and traders following an elaborate sting operation by federal prosecutors served as a reminder that fake trades used to inflate prices continue to be lingering issue in the digital asset world.】
